line_1: But as the World, harmoniously confus'd:
line_2: Not Chaos-like together crush'd and bruis'd,

line_1: In one promiscuous Carnage lye confus'd.
line_2: Whole Nations trampl'd into Dirt, and bruis'd,

line_1: Chaos of Thought and Passion, all confus'd;
line_2: Still by himself abus'd, or dis-abus'd;
Amaz'd, he knows himself a wretch abus'd;

line_1: Scene rudely knowh. Uncertain and confus'd,
line_2: His judgment by illusions was abus'd.
